comment: Fitting G0 of Eu sorption sites against experiments containing air. expr is used to calculated the Rd from different sorption sites amounts
Fitting G0 of all Eu sorption sites against experiments containing air and experiments without air. expr is used to calculated the Rd from different sorption sites amounts

Fitting G0 of Eu sorption sites against experiments containing air. expr is used to calculated the Rd from different sorption sites amounts. Uaing samplelist as data selection:Database Mode,  Filter desired data using search (query), then -> Record -> Insert record list into Task Definition
Fitting G0 of Eu sorption sites against experiments with no air. expr is used to calculated the Rd from different sorption sites amounts

Fitting G0 of Eu sorption sites against experiments with no air. expr is used to calculated the Rd from different sorption sites amounts. Monte Carlo statistical evaluation of parameters confidence intervals, UseMCPE set to  4, 50 runs
